thread.title: Happy Birthday, Tiger Shroff! Here Are 8 Things Only He Could Pull Off!
thread.title_full: Happy Birthday, Tiger Shroff! Here Are 8 Things Only He Could Pull Off!

title: Happy Birthday, Tiger Shroff! Here Are 8 Things Only He Could Pull Off!
text:
facebook 240 SHARES 
With his good looks, charming personality and killer dance moves, the one man that is stealing all the attention in Bollywood, is Tiger Shroff. Today is the hunk's 27th birthday. Did you know his real name is Jai Hemant Shroff? Bet you didn't and yes, Tiger suits him way better! Now while you let that sink in, here is a list of things only Junior Shroff could do! 1. Own a hot bod like this! A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Feb 28, 2017 at 4:42am PST 2. Hang down from a crane with such ease. A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Jan 11, 2017 at 11:28pm PST 3. Be an adorable daddy's boy! A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Dec 26, 2016 at 10:28pm PST 4. Do a split like THIS. A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Oct 9, 2016 at 5:14am PDT 5. Make your heart melt by just looking at you. A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Sep 28, 2016 at 7:42am PDT 6. Perform mind-boggling dance steps like this one. A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Aug 1, 2016 at 8:30am PDT 7. Play games his own way. A post shared by Tiger Shroff (@tigerjackieshroff) on Dec 8, 2015 at 1:44am PST 8. Look dapper AF.
